title: Legs Diamond - A Diamond Is A Hard Rock
description:
Often described as &#039;the best undiscovered band in America&#039;, LEGS DIAMOND&#039;s undoubted talent never translated to particularly strong record sales for many reasons outside of the band&#039;s control. Their rich brand of Melodic Hard Rock with a keen classic flavor early on in the band&#039;s career earned the quintet a host of admirers. Taking its name from the infamous 30&#039;s gangster Jack &#039;Legs&#039; Diamond&#039;, this Los Angeles act was initially founded in 1972 bassist Michael Gargano and drummer Jeff Poole.

It would be 1974 before the first real line-up of the band would be recognized. Having become dissatisfied with their front man, a man only identified as Greg, the band advertised for a fresh vocalist and coincidentally bumped into Rick Sanford also advertising for a band to front. Before long Sanford&#039;s position in LEGS DIAMOND was assured alongside keyboard player Michael Prince and Detroit born guitarist Roger Romeo, a late replacement for Donovan McKitty.


Artist: Legs Diamond
Album: A Diamond Is A Hard Rock
Release Date: 2001
Original Release: 1977

File Size: 72.4 MB
